TopicTitle: My Grand Tour of the Kerbin System

Articles.Content:
Others have done it. It\'s not too special. But I did it!

I used a slingshot maneuver around the Mun to get to Minmus, land, and then safely return. The album (imgur)

Not to mention that it was all stock save for r4m0n\'s camera mod.

Also, this bug resurfaced.

Share your slingshot tips!

I have never done a gravity assist...

neither have I gone to Minmus without Mechjeb.

I like to bring mech jeb along for the smart A.S.S feature to hold me steady during landings and burns, but I might try doing a trip without it for fun. I like the slingshot approach myself. For an added challenge, I might try to duplicate it on the return, though I\'ll have to change the lander/ascender fuel distribution.

Mostly, I am just enjoying the patched conics. Not sure if I would be able to even hit Minimus without that feature.
